price: Biz onlara, ilim ile apaçık açıkladığımız, iman eden bir toplum için de hidayet ve rahmet olan bir kitap getirmiştik..
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ جِئۡنَٰهُم بِكِتَٰبٖ فَصَّلۡنَٰهُ عَلَىٰ عِلۡمٍ هُدٗى وَرَحۡمَةٗ لِّقَوۡمٖ يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ji'nāhum bikitābin faṣṣalnāhu ʿalā ʿil'min hudan waraḥmatan liqawmin yu'minūna
